subject: Re: RE: hss newsletter - Image for https://hssaustralia.com.au/colorectal-lesions-and-cancer-screening/
preview: Re: RE: hss newsletter - Image for https://hssaustralia.com.au/colorectal-lesions-and-cancer-screening/

full_threads.body:
Ok for the picture



Demonstration of Endoscopic Mucosal Resection Procedure


Top Left: large laterally spreading tumour in the descending colon

Top Right: following injection of submucosal methylene blue the lesion is sequentially resected using a snare

Bottom Left: complete resection of the lesion. Procedure duration 45 minutes. Patient went home the same day. Histopathology was a tubulovillous adenoma with focal high grade dysplasia

Bottom Right: follow up colonoscopy demonstrates no residual adenomatous tissue endoscopically and on biopsies



On 19 July 2018 at 11:41, James Croll <notifications@intercom-mail.com> wrote:

Sent to Joao Henriques and mailfarzan@gmail.com

Hi there ..

It probably does need a caption … maybe 4 or 5 words or a sentence

Let us know

Joao .. could you also use the same photo for the newsletter too directing the reader to this feature?

https://hssaustralia.com.au/colorectal-lesions-and-cancer-screening/

CHEERS

JAMES
